title: Polish borscht
ingredients: ['6 to 7 dried wild mushrooms', '8 beetroot', '4 litres water', '2 onions, halved', '2 cloves garlic, halved', '10 whole allspice berries', '4 bay leaves', 'salt and pepper to taste', '5 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped (optional)']
